job.title: Data Scientist, Netskope Threat Labs
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Computer & Network Security
job.description: stronguAbout NetskopebrbrustrongToday theres more data and users outside the enterprise than inside causing the network perimeter as we know it to dissolve We realized a new perimeter was needed one that is built in the cloud and follows and protects data wherever it goes so we started Netskope to redefine Cloud Network and Data SecuritybrbrSince 2012 we have built the marketleading cloud security company and an awardwinning culture powered by hundreds of employees spread across offices in Santa Clara San Francisco Seattle Bangalore London Melbourne and Tokyo Our core values are openness honesty and transparency and we purposely developed our open desk layouts and large meeting spaces to support and promote partnerships collaboration and teamwork From catered lunches and office celebrations to employee recognition events pre and hopefully postCovid and social professional groups such as the Awesome Women of Netskope AWON we strive to keep work fun supportive and interactive Visit us at Netskope Careers and follow us on Twitter Netskope and FacebookbrbrNetskope Threat Labs is a team of security researchers and subject matter experts working together to solve todays toughest security challenges in new and innovative ways The team focuses on threats to data and infrastructure in the cloud and attackers that abuse the cloud We work closely with the security data science product and engineering teams to develop novel protection strategies against emerging cybersecurity threats Our research has been presented at conferences across the globe including Def Con Black Hat Europe CAMLIS MALCON Nullcon and AVAR Netskope has been recognized as a leader in the Magic Quadrant for Cloud Access Security Brokers CASBs for four consecutive years and as visionary in the 2020 Magic Quadrant for Secure Web Gateway SWG Learn more about Netskope Threat Labs by reading our blog monthly threat summaries and Cloud Threat ReportsbrbrIn this role you will shape the direction of research and product development across all of Netskopes products By applying your technical knowledge and analytical skills to a set of anonymized usage data collected from the Netskope Security Cloud platform you will guide research product development salesenablement and marketing effortsbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliAnalyze anonymized usage data collected from the Netskope Security Cloud platformliliAnalyze the impact of proposed and actual product changesliliIdentify opportunities to improve the security services we provide our customersliliIdentify opportunities for strategic investment in new product and research areasliliPrepare internal and external reports including the Cloud  Threat Reports through collaborations with teams within Netskope and with our partnersliliCommunicate your findings to crossfunctional peers and managementliliCollaborate with the product marketing and sales teams to inform strategic decisions with the data insights you extractbrliulstronguRequirementsbrustrongulliBachelors degree in Math Economics Bioinformatics Statistics Engineering Computer Science or other quantitative fields required MS strongly preferredlili2 years experience as a Data Scientist Product Analyst Sr Data Analyst or other type of data analysisfocused functions in industry or academialiliAdvanced SQL expertiseliliBasic understanding of experimental design such as AB experiments and statistical methodsliliAbility and experience in extracting insights from data and summarizing learnings  takeawaysliliExperience with some dashboardingdata visualization like Looker or Google Data StudioliliExperience with some big data processing platform liliSoftware development skills to develop your own tooling as neededliliDiscipline to create welltested and documented codeliliExperience working with computer networking cybersecurity or related datasetsliliCommunication skills to work in a distributed collaborative teamliliWritten and verbal skills to create and deliver highquality publications and presentationsliliVIRTUALbrliul
